contentList.content: This weapon is made of shadows, solidifed and given shape through the power of the Weave.
Eat this berry to regain 1 Hit Points. Plump and juicy, this berry exudes a soothing, sweet smell.
Create a cloud of magical darkness to Heavily Obscure and Blind creatures within from a chosen point or infuse an object with emanating darkness.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> when using this Spell on creatures wearing metal armour. This spell deals [1] at 5th level, [2] at 11th level and [3] at 17th level.

Bolster yourself or an ally with valour and health.

The target can no longer be Frightened and gains Temporary Hit Points equal to your spellcasting ability modifier each turn.

Bolster 2 allies with valour and health.

They become Immune to being Frightened and gain Temporary Hit Points equal to your spellcasting ability modifier each turn.
On a successful save, the target still takes half damage. This attack deals an additional [1] for each slot level used above 3rd on the Flaming Sphere.
Extra difficult terrain - spend 4x <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> when moving.
Difficult terrain - <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> is halved and creatures may take 3d6 Bludgeoning damage each turn and be Restrained.
Conjure ten magical berries for yourself or a companion. Creatures who eat a berry regain [1].
Hurl a sphere of energy that deals [1].
Hurl a sphere of energy that deals [1].
Hurl a sphere of energy that deals [1].

Hurl a sphere of energy.

It deals 3d8 Thunder damage, or 2d8 Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning or poison damage.
Hurl a sphere of energy that deals [1].
Hurl a sphere of energy that deals [1].
Hurl a sphere of energy that deals [1].
Create a cloud of dense fog to Heavily Obscure and Blind creatures within.
This bow shoots forth a bolt of lightning.
Conjure an additional familiar per level.
Summon gains [1] to AC, [2] and deal an additional [1] damage on attacks per level.
Spell range increases by [1] per level.
Target deals an additional 1d6 damage of the chosen damage type per level.
Deals an additional 1d6 damage of a random type per level.
Target repeats <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> each time it takes damage.
Creates two more meteors per level.
Summon gains [1] to AC, [2] and deal an additional [1] damage on attacks per level and can make a number of attacks equal to half spell's level.
Create a shard of ice and fling it at a creature.
Shard deals [1] on a hit. The shard explodes on a hit or miss, dealing [2] to the target and surrounding creatures.
Bolster yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life to gain <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">[1]</LSTag>.
Sense the presence of magic within range and use your action to see a faint aura around any visible creature in the area that bears magic.
Detect a creature that bears magic.
Detect creatures that bear magic using an action.
This is a ritual spell and may be cast out of combat without expending a spell slot.
Create [1] darts of magical force, each dealing [2] to its target.
Capture incoming energy, lessening its effect on you and storing it for your next melee attack.

You have resistance to the triggering damage type until the start of your next turn. Also, the first time you hit with a melee attack on your next turn, the target takes an extra [1] damage of the triggering type, and the spell ends.

Establish a telepathic link with a friendly beast or one charmed by you. The beast gains <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against creatures within [1] of you.
Surround a loose object weighing [1] lbs or less with force, preparing it to be launched at a creature.
Launch a previously chosen object at a creature.
This object is prepared to be catapulted.
Awaken the sense of mortality in a creature to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> of you.
Constructs and undead are immune to this effect. Additionally, the target can repeat the <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> on each of its turns.
A stream of acid emanates from you in a line [1] long and [2] wide in a direction you choose.

Each creature in the line must succeed on a Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or be covered in acid for the spell’s duration. A creature covered in the acid takes [1] at start of each of its turns.

You cause a tremor in the ground within range. Each creature other than you in that area must make a Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>. On a failed save, a creature takes [1] and is knocked <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
If the ground in that area is loose earth or stone, it becomes difficult terrain - <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> is halved.
Create an invisible, mindless, shapeless, medium force that performs simple tasks at your command until the spell ends.
Freezing cold blasts from your fingertips freezing everything that can be frozen.
An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you.

Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">AC</LSTag>, including against the triggered attack, and you take no damage from <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MagicMissile">Magic Missile</LSTag>.

Before getting hit you get a +5 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">AC</LSTag>, including against the triggered attack, and you take no damage from <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MagicMissile">Magic Missile</LSTag> until the start of your next turn.
+5 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">AC</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to damage from <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MagicMissile">Magic Missile</LSTag>.
